website_summaries.verdict: Excellent for sensitive skin, this body bar uses tea tree oil to soothe dry, irritated skin.
pros: Made with tea tree oil, which can calm and heal distressed skin
Contains parsley flakes as a gentle exfoliator
Produces a rich lather that rinses away easily without leaving a soapy film
cons: Not recommended for face as it can irritate eyes

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, repels bugs, stops itchiness
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that tea tree oil is good for relieving the itchiness of bug bites, so I decided to give this soap. You must understand, I lived in the woods for 6 weeks. I thought I handled bug bites well until I practically slept with them, and my legs were covered in welts from mosquito bites. It was horrifying. After using this soap, I noticed I did not itch as much, and the bugs also seemed to leave me alone! Upon discovering this, that poor bar of soap stood no chance - it was gone in two weeks. I love this soap. It smells amazing and it works against bugs!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Why does it have to be so expensive?
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I really do. It's the best tea tree soap I've tried, the scent is pleasant, it lathers well -- but it's so freaking expensive! I realize it's likely due to the name "Paul Mitchell" being on it, but come on! I always wait to buy it when I see the price go down.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smell & Helped my Skin
customer_reviews.text: The scent is absolutely amazing. I'm currently pregnant and instead of food cravings, I've had scent cravings. I couldn't find a soap that I loved the scent of completely and trust me, I looked everywhere. This bar has a very refreshing, crisp smell that is absolutely addictive. It also helped to clear up some acne I had developed thanks to hormones.
customer_reviews.author: Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain! Cheaper than Melaleuca, but may not perform as well....
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed good. Lasted a good long while. (Keep out of standing water!) Think I still prefer the Melaleuca Gold Bar, however, as I know the REAL tea tree oil is used in it's making. Would like more info on the source of Tea Tree oil used in this product.
customer_reviews.author: jenash42

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this product 2 others times BUT there is a problem with recent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this soap in the beginning and had no problems with the soap until I purchased the soap the third time. This last purchase is not the same soap. In fact, both my wife and I had a slight burning sensation when used on our face. After using on our face, our face became red and looked like we had sun burned our face. I believe the soap I purchased is not to the same standard as my original purchases. Quality control is lacking and I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John Harman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap!! Helped my acne go away. Smells so good and my face feels so clean after using it. I also use it to wash my beauty blenders and makeup brushes and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Ramos

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so bad I don’t even know where to begin. It has no actual benefits, whatsoever, other than the fact that it smells amazing; which in my opinion was a red flag. The peppermint scent is very pungent. I had a red rash (chocolate girl btw) on my chin after two days of use. And it also leaves your skin feeling very scummy, much like Irish Spring soap. Gross. If your looking for some real authentic tea tree soap I’d HIGHLY recommend you try tea tree soap by essential palace. It isn’t available for prime here on Amazon, but you should definitely be able to find it in just about any African Shop. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, great soap
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this soap since I've used it a few years ago. The shop I used to buy it from closed down and I finally thought about Googling it and found it on Amazon. The price was fair compared to everyone else who sells the soap. It was delivered quickly and is exactly what I was expecting. Great smell, great soap. No negatives from me.
customer_reviews.author: Skip In Austin Texas

customer_reviews.title: No need for lotion after shower
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. It is a little expensive but buy 2 and unwrap and let 'cure'. When soap is unwrapped for a while it hardens a bit and so lasts longer. I do this with any soap as many can get so soft you lose some of the soap in the dish tray. I never like the smell of tea tree oil but am becoming a fan. I really like the fact that I don't usually have to use lotion after a shower with this soap as it is creamy and makes skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu43

customer_reviews.title: Works great but just a heads up...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is a nice soap. However if you use this below the waist it can cause a icy sensation from the peppermint oil. Don’t let it freak you out. Just thought I’d let people know since it can be a little alarming.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Came back for more
customer_reviews.text: Great soap. I am buying again. Using it myself after the gym and for my teen to hold back any funky odor. Lasts a long time too. Smell is not as strong as liquid soaps, which is nice. I have pets and worry about how much EO are used in some products. This soap does leave the bathroom smelling fresh from the tea tree oil but not as strong as liquid soaps. Daughter has sensitive skin and had a rash under her arm and the soap helped a lot cleaning it up (possibly bacteria from itching it) . All four of us use this soap. I would say a bar lasts 6 week? With us showering every other day?
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is the genuine thing.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is the genuine thing...The outside soap packaging that I received does not show Paul Mitchell as displayed on the Amazon product page. And the package looks so old and worn out...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soap to remove bacteria and acne on face!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is truly amazing. I had dry skin, acne and other skin issues with the face and nose. I would wash my face with it 1-2 times a day and within days it helped to fix those problems. Wasn't a complete fix but did better than other other soap or product that I've tried in the past. And trust me, I've tried a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Davis

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy this soap again! Not worthy of this brand name!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with this soap at first until after 3rd week. I don’t use this soap everyday so I just put in the shower room like I always do with other soaps. The soap started to smell bad like if it is rotten food. Seriously! I cannot think of the reason. I keep my soap dry when I am not using it. I am a fan of this Tea Tree brand since I was introduced to their shampoo which is my most favorite and best I have ever used. But this soap really is a disappointment. It cleans second best from my experience tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Win

customer_reviews.title: Rash bug bites
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten the worst case of chiggers ever! Nothing was working! Even went to the doctor for ointment. Nope didn’t work. But a few year back I had use tea tree soap and oil with table salt to get rid of what was called the Spartan rash. It was gud awful!!! This soap saved me from night of being up itching and wanting to die from my skin hurting. It did the same with the chiggers. It does dry out your skin or at least it did mine a lil. But it worked. I love the smell!!! And it hold up really well being left in the shower on a slated soap dish.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kurgan

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with the other Tea Tree products - good consistency and the bars last a reasonable amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes well with the other Tea Tree products - good consistency and the bars last a reasonable amount of time, though not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: MJLSr

customer_reviews.title: Was a decent soap for 5 dollars, but not for 14 dollars plus shipping
customer_reviews.text: They bumped the price of this soap by 70% I think its a mistake. The soap lasts one month with little good smell and have sanitation problem as the soap gets dirty by itself with brown flakes forming around the soap body. Gross! the soap turns brown after a couple of weeks, they just slapped tea tree flakes on a plain soap doesn't make it sanitary. I was dissatisfied, come on!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent texture and fragrance, but doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this soap five stars if each bar lasted longer. It’s gentle, creamy, and smells great. I stopped buying it only because it doesn’t last long, so to me, it’s not a good value. It’s great soap though, and I highly recommend it if you don’t mind that you have to buy it often.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap!!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is probably better suited for men, as the strong Tea Tree Oil scent can be over powering for a woman. I personally love how it wakes you up and makes your skin tingle ( and yes, the first time you use it, you may have a panic moment when you wash your goods, lol, but don't worry it will leave you fresh and clean and won't sting ) Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, easily rinses off
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooling scent and rinse clean composition of this soap. It makes the whole bathroom smell nice after use. It can get a little soggy if left in a hot, humid bathroom so run your bathroom fans, open the shower curtain or leave open the shower door so it firms up nicely again.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn C. McCutchan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely purchase again. It truly is invigorating and leaves skin soft and clean. No residue like other soaps leave. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This soap appears to also have something like eucalyptus as an additional ingredient...
customer_reviews.text: This soap appears to have additional ingredients as it had the effect of chilling the skin like there was wintergreen or eucalyptus in the soap. It was okay on arms, body and legs, but do not let it get on sensitive areas. I will not buy this again. I use other tea tree oil soaps with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: KCxx2

customer_reviews.title: Weak tea tree oil content.
customer_reviews.text: Amount of tea tree oil is minimal. Doesn't control odor well. Thursday Plantation is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: smells amazing but it gave me hives that didn’t go away for a week. i wouldn’t recommend it for people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: soap for winter
customer_reviews.text: I used this soap during winter as I'm on a quest to find a bar soap acceptable for men that doesn't dry out my skin so much. I found this did not dry out my skin, but I was not in love with its fragrance and also it disappears very quickly. It is a decent soap, but I'll probably try something else next time. No compelling reason for me to buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Very cleansing, high price point
customer_reviews.text: This soap will leave you felling extremely cleansed. Value point for its money? It is a bit on the pricey side for a bar of soap that will not last you a month if you use it daily. It is name brand so the ingredients are high quality. Still quite a lot of money for one bar of soap. If you struggle with coming home for your work day feeling pretty dirty, this may be the soap for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but harsh. Didn't continue to use
customer_reviews.text: It's ok soap, and the bar is very large which helps justify the price. Has good moisturizing properties overall but for me this is very harsh soap. The scent/tea tree is quite aggressive and aggravated my skin for a while. I used once and threw it away. Really a shame. Still decent soap it seems but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This body bar I use entirely on my face only. The Tea Tree is a refreshing change from other facial soap. My clean feels cleaner, fresher and more vibrant. The scent is intoxicating and the sensation from the Tea Tree is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Tea Tree shampoo for years and always loved the fresh feeling it provided along with its functional characteristics. I decided to give Paul Mitchell's soap a trial and I loved it. After showering, I truly felt fresh and invigorated to hit the day running. I've now been using this soap for over 6 months and it's still giving the freshness daily. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SU Fan

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! It arrived today and I used it in my shower. Oh my gosh! I love it! It sort of tingles on the skin and it smells so good. I put it in my husband's bathroom so he can try it tomorrow. If he likes it I will order one for his shower too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: When I took the bar of soap out of the box and put it in the bathroom, there was a strong Mint smell for two days. But, in my opinion after using it for 7 days... not worth the money. No extra moisturizing or benefits over using my regular (much less expensive) store brand soap. Will not re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Valeri B. Obryan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best soaps ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Seriously, i have had boils on my chest since i got back from afghanistan in 2007, its 2020 now and this freaking stuff is getting rid of them! The VA has failed for years to give a solution that helps i wish i new about this stuff 13 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses the skin while leaving a Tea Tree scent
customer_reviews.text: I like this tea tree bar soap. Tea Tree soap is a quick way for me to cleanse the body of some toxins. Sparingly using this product with the Tea Tree Shampoo feels like I deep cleansed my skin while leaving me smelling like tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: I Can't Use this on my face
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, if you read the microscopic print you will learn you cannot get it in your eyes. Therefore, you can not wash your face with it. It has a super, super-strong scent, wow! I do wash my hair with it and get very big hair once dried. Most bar soaps will give you big hair. I wanted this one for the tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sunlightening

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap my mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom found the super cheap nearly half normal price. Even cheaper than I can buy them from the beauty supply store. I am a LC cosmetologist with my pro card I usually get 30-50% off products. Usually these bars are 12.99 retail to the public. I ran across them here on amazon for 5 bucks. I stocked up on them for her. She loves this soap always has. It is her favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Paige B.

customer_reviews.title: Strongest Tea Tree Soap
customer_reviews.text: So far it's the best Tea Tree soap I've found. It cures the acne on your face better than any acne treatment, and it leaves you feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Last forever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soap, gives up tons of lather. And it gives up that thick lather until the bitter end. Most soaps stop lathering about 1/2 to 3/4 of the way through the bar, this lathers until the bitter end. Yes, it cost a little more, but you are getting more! I paid full price and have no affiliation with the company at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Helps my skin issues including itching. Not drying. Reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: This soap has always been a favorite of mine. Its antibacterial properties are ideal and it does not dry out my skin. The scent is fresh and, however not a fake added perfume, therefore I smell like the perfume I wear, not perfume and the soap. I also love the PM tea tree shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Teamara

customer_reviews.title: The Guy Smell
customer_reviews.text: The problem with most bar soaps for men is that the scent is, well, neh. Smells like nothing much. The Tea Tree bar, however, has a proper pine-woods scent and belongs in a guy bathroom. Plus, it's a hard milled soap and is long lasting. At ten bucks a shot is has to be.
customer_reviews.author: Winterbear

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. I felt clean when using it but it REALLY cleans you... squeaky clean. Skin didn't feel soft or moisturized after use. It didn't last very long at all - needs to be on a rack so it doesn't break down in water. Decent soap but I won't be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this saop
customer_reviews.text: Love this saop. Fresh clean feeling after my shower. Soap is pricey, so I can't buy this all the time. I do recommend it. Peppermint scent is great too....but beware.....you will feel the tingle/burning sensation in your private area.
customer_reviews.author: SWEETBEA

customer_reviews.title: I deal with horrible yeast infections
customer_reviews.text: This soap is a lifesaver. I deal with horrible yeast infections, like the rest of my family, where any crease is subject to invasion from the stuff. It's miserable, but I've had some luck using tea tree oil. This bar is like magic. The tea tree in this bar leaves my skin tingling and cool, and reduces the flare-ups, without the smell being too overwhelming. It's also excellent for shaving, as advertised on the box. My skin is soft and smooth and feeling great. I wish I could find this locally.
customer_reviews.author: E. Egao

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic !!!! I have serious issues as other buyer reviewed. I was using a tree tree oil wash from Amazon...very good. This is even better. Believe all the reviews. It seems to protect longer than the wash
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Houston

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Oil works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I have dry sensitive skin and Paul Mitchell's Tea Tree Oil body bar works great! They are expensive but worth it. I downgraded the scent because I prefer an unscented product. That said the scent is still refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tittle

customer_reviews.title: This Soap is Tops in our Household
customer_reviews.text: We love this soap and it really does an excellent cleaning job. Other soaps do not pack the punch that this has. The scent is also amazing and makes the bathroom smell nice. Tea Tree by Paul Mitchell Line is the absolute finest in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: RosAnn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Faster shipping than expected! Smells great, leaves your skin smooth, refreshed and minty feeling! Also the aroma fills my bathroom up nicely. Will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: CavScoutCasey

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it smelled ok. But once it’s used it let’s off a terrible smell that doesn’t go away. It stays thick and strong no matter how well ventilated your bathroom is 👎🏽👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM F PADILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this soap lathers, and smells. However, it is FAR too expensive to justify. You could easily get several months worth of soap for the price of a single one of these bars.
customer_reviews.author: Dreygyr

customer_reviews.title: Great bar soap!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive? Yes, but I love the shampoo and shaving cream and this soap leaves you smelling great and feeling fresh! These Paul Mitchell products are higher in quality than others. You get what you pay for and I’ll keep purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and refreshing....
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I ordered three bars because of the tea tree oil. The scent is really good and a little loud but smells refreshing. It covers body odor well. I have night sweats. Love the peppermint in the soap... The price is high. I wish it came in a 3 for $9.00 deal. I don't know how long I can afford to buy the soap. It is pricey. Overall, it is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Steffie

customer_reviews.title: Not too thrilled, was hoping to get same feeling as I get from shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the same smell and feeling I get from Paul Mitchell tea tree shampoo, but it failed me. It is very soapy, which I like, but it’s hard to wash it off. Not buying it again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: e-broker

customer_reviews.title: More peppermint than tea tree
customer_reviews.text: The bar has the faint smell of the shampoo / conditioner but is mostly peppermint. In use the peppermint is very apparent and has the same chilling effect as Dr. Bronner’s does but unfortunately at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: CozyHiki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and even nice for dry and oily skin. (I know, Dry AND oily...thanks genetics)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: freshhhhhh mintyyyyy ooohhhhh!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I cannott live without this tea tree soap! It makes a regular shower into a minty refreshing relaxing time! It also keeps my skin soft and clear! This seller cares and gets it right out to you! I love that! :) you should try this yourself! you'lle never want to stop using it! It seems to wash away my stress! It is very invigurating!!! :) Valerie
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE :)

customer_reviews.title: love these bars but dont last
customer_reviews.text: this is great soap and the smell is what you would expect. My only negative comment would be is that they do not last as other soap bars, so be prepared to by lots when you see them on sale
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Helps tremendously with acne!
customer_reviews.text: Great for people with oily skin. Good way to wake up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Weber

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Product received not genuine
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE - the product I received wasn’t the real Paul Mitchell Tea Tree soap. The packaging appeared to be genuine but the actual soap was a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: I usually only use this to shave in the shower and wash my face. Smell can be a little strong for first time users. Cleans my face to my liking
customer_reviews.author: Jtcfish

customer_reviews.title: Super Soap
customer_reviews.text: The sweet aroma of tea tree oil wafted in the air the moment I opened the shipping materials. Great feel in the hand. Placed in natural material shower bag and it suds up like a charm. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product !!!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ... when I use it on my face it has a cooling after wash feeling and the scent has a herbal smell leaving you refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Ko L.

customer_reviews.title: Bar too large and slippery compared to other options
customer_reviews.text: This bar is oversized even if it wasn't especially slippery for a bar of soap. Its slippery makeup also causes it to dissolve faster than other tea tree bath soap bars. The scent is great though, plenty strong and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Wheelbarrow Racers

customer_reviews.title: Best summer body soap.
customer_reviews.text: Best soap to use in the hot summer months, when sweat is always present! The scent really wakes you up, and it leaves your skin feeling tingling all over, as if you rubbed a peppermint Patti all over your skin. We love it at my house, and if you have oily skin, it’s even better!
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very strong soap and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Has a very strong and natural clean scent. It makes you clean so you smell clean and not like your tying to mask body odor with a cheap deodorant. I love this soap it’s very aggressive on your skin(which I like) so if you don’t want a rough bar of soap look at something else. I feel it’s a little overpriced and that’s my only issue. I am a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Gpadriver

customer_reviews.title: Good but damaged last time
customer_reviews.text: Great product but last time I ordered it it arrived damaged with a big chunk taken out. It was still wrapped in the plastic and the box was in fine condition so my guess is that it’s just a quality issue from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Winston

customer_reviews.title: Not the best soap, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not as decent as it's hair product line for some reason, in turns of cleaning it was okay. Local handmade soap might be better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Berggie

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed Tea Tree for years for my hear and was pleased when i found about the soap bar. Hoping to find a body wash also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Works Fast on Fungus!
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells so good, doesn't dry out my skin, AND most amazing ... is eliminating some athlete's foot fungus I have on one of my feet. I really can't believe it - I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and acene. This soap is awesome because it helps with acene and doesn’t irritate my skin at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good T tree in the soap helps
customer_reviews.text: This is an average size so butter tea tree oil smells great and fits in a normal sized soap dish and helps the skin feel soft.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree
customer_reviews.text: I love tea tree oil products and this line is wonderful to use. Most likely I will be buying another bar soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is wonderful love the scent and makes your skin feel great. I have sensitive skin and this soap is non irritating.

customer_reviews.title: the best soap you'll ever use
customer_reviews.text: But, it's a bit expensive. On the plus side, it lasts a really long time, smells amazing, and cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell like the shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would smell exactly like the moisturizing shampoo, but it doesn’t. It smells fine, but has more of a minty/peppermint smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new soap.
customer_reviews.text: This soap makes your skin feel so refreshed. Feels like there is mint in it and the tea tree smell is light and not overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver !!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has saved my skin from psoriasis as well as acne !!!! I would pay $20 for this soap if need be !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture and the scent, you can't beat tea tree oil fragrance for that healthy aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Zermattman

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to traditional soap!
customer_reviews.text: Ha, I am NOT the kind of person to pay more than the norm for something but I pay between $7 and $10/ bar for the PM soap and it's worth every penny and then some. It eradicated my athletes foot! No joke, totally replaced a prescription med that had side effects. Beside all that this PM Tea Tree smells wonderful and makes your bathroom smell like a spa!
customer_reviews.author: nik m.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product for athletes foot
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product for athletes to prevent or heal foot fungus/jock itch. It keeps the skin extremely free of moisture that causes fugus problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. V.

customer_reviews.title: You need this soap if you have sensitive skin like me!
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this soap. It leaves no residue. Keeps my skin soft and blemish free. It’s the ONLY soap I use now! I have eczema and KP. I’ve finally found a soap that makes my skin feel fresh and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great tea tree oil soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, invigorating and hydrating with a great lather. Smells delicious and leaves you feeling super clean!!
customer_reviews.author: yasmeen elsawy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Smells more of mint than tea tree and it really drys your skin. Won’t be getting again!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Halcomb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the scent! It's so invigorating and refreshing. Makes my skin feel alive, too. Lathers up really well. It's a large bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chad G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap for hidradentitis suppertiva sufferers
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer with hidradentitis suppertiva, using this soap will help reduce the frequency of breakouts. It's a bit costly but well work the results.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanda Weems

customer_reviews.title: Pine Sol not Tea Tree
customer_reviews.text: It cleans well enough but the scent, at least for me, goes from Tea Tree to Pine Sol very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Frank The Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great soap in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Great natural antibacterial / antifungal. Smells great and cleans great too!
customer_reviews.author: RTPMason

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap.
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap just wish it wasn't so darn expensive, on the other hand it will last a while if you keep it in a dry spot in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaMarie777

customer_reviews.title: Streaks
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but it leaves white streaks on my body. Not a fan enough to by again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Valenziano

customer_reviews.title: Te Tree Soap
customer_reviews.text: I would like it better in a more oval shape which is easier for me to hold while showering
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Joubert

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love how this soap smells. Very clean fragrance. It's expensive, so maybe a splurge, but nice!
customer_reviews.author: xDebx

customer_reviews.title: No tingling
customer_reviews.text: This is basically just a very overpriced bar of soap. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: favorite soap of all time
customer_reviews.text: The only soap I've ever purchased twice. Probably about 10 times now, as I've been using it for over 2 years. It's big, it lasts a long time and smells WONDERFUL! It also seems to help with acne. My kids love it too. The only problem is the price, but I still say it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great soap / Clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. Haven't had body (ass) acne since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel serrato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I use it daily. It has great lather. So much so that I use it to shave my legs with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: The most refreshing bar of soap ever! Cant say enough about his product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean smell, no residue after shower, and bar lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: perfect long lasting soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! helps gets rid of that skin bacteria you get from too much sun!
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best soaps that I have tried. I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive! But I still buy it. Lasts pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: I already have a name

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap makes your skin feel smooth an just overall cleaner after a shower
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: My favorite soap
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this soap. I love the smell and it lathers really well. These are large bars that last a while.
customer_reviews.author: simmons-1

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Body Bar, 5.3 oz
product_meta.description:
Tea Tree Body Bar® is the best wake-up call for weary skin, bar none. Enriched with parsley flakes to gently exfoliate and tea tree oil, known for its antiseptic and healing properties, this richly lathering bar soap cleans, exfoliates and helps all skin types feel fresh. Added bonus: It’s excellent for shaving!

Fragrance: The invigorating aroma of mint, eucalyptus, lavender and rosemary provides a fresh, clean feel.



BRAND STORY
Tea Tree is botanical hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products that is committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
